page.title: 11Motorway Junction Survey
page.content: The{M56 Motorway}joins the{M6 Motorway to the Wirral and N.Wales. We went to the Motorway{Junction 14}at{Hapsford for a traffic survey. We were in 6 groups counting all the traffic joining and leaving the Motorway and travelling through N.E.and S.W.from 10.30 to 10.50 on Monday{May 13th.1985 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ {Results. _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Cars_leaving 57,joining 50,through 611 Trks_ " 28, " 35, " 328 Vans_ " 14, " 9, " 76 Cchs_ " 5, " 4, " 10 Mbks_ " 0, " 0, " 3 ______________________________________ {Totals " 104, 98, " 1028 ______________________________________ {Total Vehicles 1230 in 20mts. " " {3690 per hour.
